abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33332726, pmid33301437, pmid33301436, pmid33332535, pmid33320086, pmid33331654, pmid33332691, pmid33305788, pmid33331927, pmid33332779
